decision_conditions:
<p>All new works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.

</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure the development integrates with the host building and surrounding terrace row.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9bc4ed31-7fff-1fc4-0bc1-eb6f77409691"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">In the event that groundwater is encountered during excavation, a groundwater mitigation plan should be submitted to the LPA for approval to ensure that flood mitigation measures are implemented.</span></span></p><p>REASON: To mitigate the effects of flooding on-site.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6c727403-7fff-31ae-276e-f392c30d9cfe"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 11pt;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 11pt;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of the permeable 'finish' and water butt with overflow shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To mitigate the effects of surface flooding.&nbsp;</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Proposed works: Erection of a single-storey rear ground floor extension; the excavation of the basement to provide an additional storey at basement level; and the addition of a light well in the front yard.
